messages.message:
<!channel> @Ted and I have been working on trying to figure out the specification on how to create a generic representation for various document types inside Instabase.

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1i0N5tubdIIKYxx5PQDIu2v6UGQk4t7vLdmDtNZzLItA/edit# is an attempt at one such specification.  The idea is that IBML is composition of a spec *and* public libraries for easier parsing.  Please leave your feedback on the document.

The first consumers of this spec would be the annotator Apps, and the IBOCR refactor.
The doc link says that permission is denied?
